BattleShip

Game Objective

  1. The object of Battleship is to try and sink all of the other player's before they sink all of your ships.
  2. Other player's ships are somewhere on the board.
  3. You try and hit them by calling out the coordinates of one of the squares on the board.
  4. The other player also tries to hit your ships by calling out coordinates.
  5. Neither you nor the other player can see the other's board so you must try to guess where they are.

Starting a New Game

  1. Each player places the 5 ships somewhere on their board.
  2. The ships can only be placed vertically or horizontally. Diagonal placement is not allowed.
  3. No ships may be placed on another ship.

  4. The 5 ships are:

    • Carrier (occupies 5 spaces)
    • Battleship (4)
    • Cruiser (3)
    • Submarine (3)
    • Destroyer (2)

Playing the Game

  1. Player's take turns guessing by calling out the coordinates.
  2. The opponent responds with "hit" or "miss" as appropriate.
  3. When all of the squares that one your ships occupies have been hit, the ship will be sunk.
  4. As soon as all of one player's ships have been sunk, the game ends.
